SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN (DELVRY_GI_CMPLT = 'Y' AND NVL(DELVRY_GR_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N') THEN 1 END) AS grcdc,
COUNT(CASE WHEN NVL(DELVRY_GI_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N' THEN 1 END) AS gicdc
FROM LOG0054M

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SCAN_NO) AS girdc
FROM LOG0087D WHERE SCAN_TYPE = 30

SELECT l55.DELVRY_NO AS delno, l55.REQST_NO AS reqstno, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l47.REQST_CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS reqstdt, tran.CODE_NAME AS stktrans, trand.CODE_NAME AS stkactivity, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28c.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS frmloc, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS toloc, l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC AS frmlocid, l47.REQST_CDC_RDC AS tolocid, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l54.DELVRY_DT, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'dd/mm/yyyy'), '-') AS deldate, l55.DELVRY_QTY AS delqty, l54.CRT_USER_ID AS crt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l54.CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS crtdt
FROM log0047m l47 LEFT JOIN SYS0028M s28c ON l47.RCIV_CDC_RDC = s28c.WH_LOC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0028M s28q ON l47.REQST_CDC_RDC = s28q.WH_LOC_ID, (SELECT REQST_NO, DELVRY_NO, SUM(NVL(DELVRY_QTY, 0)) DELVRY_QTY FROM LOG0055D GROUP BY REQST_NO, DELVRY_NO) l55, LOG0054M l54, (SELECT * FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = 306) tran, (SELECT * FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = 308) trand WHERE 1 = 1 AND l47.TRNSC_TYPE = tran.CODE AND l47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL = trand.CODE AND l47.REQST_NO = l55.REQST_NO AND l54.DELVRY_NO = l55.DELVRY_NO
AND l54.DELVRY_GI_CMPLT = 'Y' AND NVL(l54.DELVRY_GR_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N'
AND NVL(l54.DELVRY_GI_CMPLT, 'N') = 'N'
ORDER BY l55.DELVRY_NO DESC

SELECT l87.SERIAL_NO AS serialno, l87.SEQ AS seq, l87.BOX_NO AS boxno, l87.CRT_USER_ID AS crt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l87.CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS crtdt
FROM LOG0087D l87 WHERE l87.SCANINFO_STUS = 'N' AND l87.REQST_NO = #{delno} AND l87.MATNR = #{itmcode}

SELECT l87.SCAN_NO AS scanno, l87.SEQ AS seq, l87.SERIAL_NO AS serialno, l87.MATNR AS itmcode, S26.STK_DESC AS itmdesc, l87.SCANINFO_STUS AS scanstus, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l87.REQST_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS reqstdt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28c.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS frmloc, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR (s28q.WH_LOC_DESC, 4000) AS toloc, l87.CRT_USER_ID AS crt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(l87.CRT_DT, 'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS crtdt
FROM LOG0087D l87 JOIN SYS0026M s26 ON l87.MATNR = s26.STK_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS0028M s28c ON l87.FROM_LOC_ID = s28c.WH_LOC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0028M s28q ON l87.TO_LOC_ID = s28q.WH_LOC_ID WHERE l87.SCAN_TYPE = 30 AND l87.SCANINFO_STUS = 'N'

SELECT l55.ITM_CODE AS itmcode, l55.ITM_NAME AS itmdesc, SUM(l55.DELVRY_QTY) AS delqty, NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIAL_NO) FROM LOG0087D WHERE REQST_NO = #{delno} AND MATNR = l55.ITM_CODE AND SCANINFO_STUS = 'N' AND SCAN_TYPE != 30), '0') AS scanqty, SUM(l55.DELVRY_QTY) - NVL((SELECT COUNT(SERIAL_NO) FROM LOG0087D WHERE REQST_NO = #{delno} AND MATNR = l55.ITM_CODE AND SCANINFO_STUS = 'N' AND SCAN_TYPE != 30) , '0') AS remainqty FROM LOG0055D l55 WHERE l55.DELVRY_NO = #{delno} GROUP BY l55.ITM_CODE, l55.ITM_NAME
